Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET1 WHERE H2VACODI = :H2VACODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL

INSERT INTO CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET1 ( H2VADET1CODI, H2VACODI, ANIO, MONTOINVERSION, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :H2VADET1CODI, :H2VACODI, :ANIO, :MONTOINVERSION, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET1 SET ANIO = :ANIO, MONTOINVERSION = :MONTOINVERSION, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE H2VADET1CODI = :H2VADET1CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET1 ORDER BY H2VADET1CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET1 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE H2VACODI IN (SELECT H2VACODI FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VA WHERE PROYCODI= :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = 0) AND IND_DEL = 0
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET1 WHERE H2VACODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
